Author: Microsoft Developer
Title: SQL database in Fabric - What's new and generally available | Data Exposed
Description:
SQL database in Fabric recently went generally available. Learn about everything in the release, what else was announced at GA, and what the roadmap is. Also, take a look at a sample architecture and code that shows off Fabric SQL end to end in Microsoft Fabric, plus Foundry and Azure.

0:00 Introduction 2:50 New features in SQL database in Fabric 7:14 Top Use Cases and Scenarios 10:05 Demo 13:35 Getting started
